RumorFact.Text: The Nomai transported materials from the mining site to a settlement called Hopper Town.

ExploreFact.Text: Traveling through the black hole near Hopper Town will allow you to retain an increase in your size.
The hoppers and anglerfish cannot eat you if you are larger than them. The hoppers will flee from larger objects.
Hoppers can eat anglerfish if they are large enough. Dark Bramble experiences spatial distortions that can cause objects to permanently increase or decrease in size.
